passages.text:
Divine ocean! Mighty sea! On this day, we honor you!
[[continue1]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
You have bestowed a great bounty upon us, and so we have feasted! You have protected us from those who are ignorant to your godliness, and so we have prospered! And now, you have called out from your deepest depths with demands of restitution. And so we have listened!
[[What's going on?!|WhatsGoingOn]]
[[...|silence]]
passages.name: continue1

passages.text:
Oh mighty ocean, we make ourselves humble before you! Even though the less educated among us may cry out in fear, we have gathered each and every citizen who has benefited from your generosity.
[[continue2]]
passages.name: WhatsGoingOn

passages.text:
Oh mighty ocean, we make ourselves humble before you! And though there are strangers among us, we have gathered each and every citizen who has benefited from your generosity.
[[continue2]]
passages.name: silence

passages.text:
But only one will carry the great honor of being chosen. Only one may make the great journey into your heavenly lands!
[[continue3]]
passages.name: continue2

passages.text:
You have chosen this pilgrim with your infinite and unquestionable wisdom. You have sent us an abundance of [FishType1] and [FishType2], the symbols of [Trait1] and [Trait2]. We have feasted upon their prophetic flesh, and thus, we have been nourished by your mandate.
[[continue4]]
passages.name: continue3

passages.text:
And now, we shall deliver unto you what you are owed! Bring forth the chosen, [ChosenName]!
[[What are you doing to them?|What doing]]
[[Stop! You can't do this!|Stop]]
[[...|continue5]]

links.name: What are you doing to them?|What doing
links.link: What are you doing to them?|What doing

passages.name: continue4

passages.text:
We are doing what's best. The greater good demands the sacrifice of the individual. [ChosenName] is happy to oblidge, even if they themself don't know it yet. [ChosenName] knew that the tides could flow in their favor.
[[continue5]]
passages.name: What doing

passages.text:
I'd advise you to calm down, stranger. You will find that you are quite powerless against the tides of fate.
[[continuestop]]
passages.name: Stop

passages.text:
The greater good demands the sacrifice of the individual. [ChosenName] is happy to oblidge, even if they themself don't know it yet. [ChosenName] knew that the tides could flow in their favor.
[[continue5]]
passages.name: continuestop

passages.text:
Mighty ocean! Accept this sacrifice as a symbol of our humility! Know that our devotion is undying!
[[continue8]]
passages.name: continue7

passages.text:
[ChosenName], rejoice! Let your spirit grow light as your lungs grow heavy with brine. Feel the warmth of the sea's benevolence as the waterâ€™s cold envelops you.
[[continue9]]
passages.name: continue8

passages.text: Rejoice, [ChosenName], as the tides flow in your favor.
passages.name: continue9
